mapper.insert: insert into lian_bank (lian_bank_code, bank_name, need_brabank, invest_flag, withdraw_flag, single_amt, day_amt, month_amt, lian_status, status, update_time, bank_logo, seq_num) values (#{lianBankCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{needBrabank,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{investFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{withdrawFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{singleAmt,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dayAmt,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{monthAmt,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lianStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{bankLogo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{seqNum,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update lian_bank set bank_name = #{bankName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, need_brabank = #{needBrabank,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, invest_flag = #{investFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, withdraw_flag = #{withdrawFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, single_amt = #{singleAmt,jdbcType=INTEGER}, day_amt = #{dayAmt,jdbcType=INTEGER}, month_amt = #{monthAmt,jdbcType=INTEGER}, lian_status = #{lianStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, bank_logo = #{bankLogo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, seq_num = #{seqNum,jdbcType=INTEGER} where lian_bank_code = #{lianBankCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select lian_bank_code, bank_name, need_brabank, invest_flag, withdraw_flag, single_amt, day_amt, month_amt, lian_status, status, update_time, bank_logo, seq_num from lian_bank where lian_bank_code = #{lianBankCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
